Trade/Device Name(s): CDC Human Influenza Virus Real-time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel: Influenza A/B Typing Kit (VER 2)
Influenza B Lineage Genotyping Kit (VER 1.1 and 2)
Submitter Information: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
Regulation Name(s): Respiratory Viral Panel Multiplex Nucleic Acid Assay
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Applied Biosystems 7500 Fast Dx Real-time PCR system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for CDC Human Influenza Virus Real-time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel (A/B Typing, A Subtyping, B Lineage Genotyping, and A/H5 Subtyping Kits) for qualitative detection, characterization, and surveillance of influenza viruses using real-time RT-PCR.
Indications for Use Summary: For qualitative detection and characterization of influenza virus (type A/B, subtypes H3 and H1pdm09, B lineages, and presumptive A/H5) RNA in respiratory and conjunctival specimens and/or viral culture to aid in patient diagnosis and influenza surveillance.
